{{Extra musicsample |type=single |filename = Possession (Sarah McLachlan).ogg
|format = Ogg |title="Possession"}} }} 'Possession' is the first single from
Sarah McLachlan's album [[Fumbling Towards Ecstasy]]. It was released in Canada
on 10 September 1993 by Nettwerk Records.

The song appears twice on the album as the first track and as a hidden track: a
solo piano version following the last track "Fumbling Towards Ecstasy."
categories: Music videos directed by Sophie Muller
